item.description: Hi Everybody. We would like to invite you back to Desi Fridays at Caprice! We are back with Da-bang in summer of 2011. Ladies free before 11:00 PM this week. Dress to Impress GenerationDesi presents DESI FRIDAYS!! The Hottest, Biggest, Trendiest and only Desi Nite in Boston Starting Friday July 15th 2011 in Downtown Boston at Caprice Lounge. With 2 floors of Music. (Relive your memories while you create new ones) EVENT FEATURES Bollywood ~Bhangra~Hip Hop & House music played all nite, so get ready to dance the nite away. 1st Floor:: Intl/ Hip Hop/ House & Desi Mashups 2nd Floor: Bollywood/ Bhangra/ Remixes - Rishi & Jay Thakkrar aka Dj RSB & JT Enjoy Caprice Lounge's vibrant & exotic cocktails . Doors Open @ 10:30 PM. Party till 2 AM When: Join us Each & Every Friday to see what all the buzz is all about!!!! Where: Caprice Boston, 248 Tremont st ~ Boston ,MA Dress Code: Proper dress. “Upscale dress code is required” NO Sneakers, NO Sports Apparel & NO Baggie Attire. Please Dress to Impress. Age: 21+ Cover $10 only on the Guestlist by emailing: Generationdesi@gmail.com $15 otherwise. Ladies Free before 11:00 PM this week Book your birthday parties/ graduation party with us - Private booths with VIP bottle service available *** CELEBRATING A BIRTHDAY? or a Occasion? ***Birthday Packages, Bottle Services, Group Rates, Corporate Parties, All Occasions are welcome at Fashion Fridays! Book your tables ASAP!!! RSVP FULL NAMES TO = Generationdesi@gmail.com For more information please call 617 216 1492 If your interested in advertising your business At the Desi Fridays, Doing cross promo's or more, please contact Jeet for more info. All major Group Rates and Deals are available upon request. Official Site: http://GenerationDesi... Admission :Ladies free before 11:00 PM on the Guestlist, $10 for Men. $15 otherwise. GL closes at midnight
item.name: Desi Fridays at Caprice. Bhangra/Bollywood. Ladies free b4 11pm.
